root.Summary: 1: Li D, Mei H, Pu J, Xiang X, Zhao X, Qu H, Huang K, Zheng L, Tong Q. Intelectin1 suppresses the growth, invasion and metastasis of neuroblastoma cells throughup-regulation of N-myc downstream regulated gene 2.
